Class DataBaseHandling

java.lang.Object
DataBaseHandling
public class DataBaseHandling extends Object
The class which contains the methods that handle the connection and data flow between the application and MYSQL database.

      public static User LogInUser(Connection connection, String login, String password)
      The method which allows the user to log in the system.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection class object necessary to access the database
      login - username - String provided by the user
      password - password - String provided by the user
      Returns:
      User object (if method was successful) or null (if user provided incorrect input/connection with database failed)

      public static boolean RemoveOrthodontistFromDB(Connection connection, User admin, User orthodontistToRemove, User orthodontistToPassPatients)
      The method which allows the administrator to remove orthodontist's data from the database.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection class object necessary to access the database
      admin - User object - the administrator who is removing the orthodontist from the database
      orthodontistToRemove - User object - the orthodontist whose data is being removed from the database
      orthodontistToPassPatients - User object - the orthodontist who will treat the patients of removed orthodontist from now on
      Returns:
      boolean true (if method was successful) or false (if user provided incorrect input/connection with database failed)
